name: Chimera
descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) is a suspected China-based threat group that has been active since at least 2018 targeting the semiconductor industry in Taiwan as well as data from the airline industry.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Local Account
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used net user for account discovery.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Domain Account
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has has used net user /dom and net user Administrator to enumerate domain accounts including administrator accounts.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Web Protocols
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used HTTPS for C2 communications.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: DNS
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154) to encapsulate C2 in DNS traffic.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Archive via Utility
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used gzip for Linux OS and a modified RAR software to archive data on Windows hosts.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Automated Collection
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used custom DLLs for continuous retrieval of data from memory.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Browser Information Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used type \\\c$\Users\\Favorites\Links\Bookmarks bar\Imported From IE\*citrix* for bookmark discovery.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Password Spraying
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used multiple password spraying attacks against victim's remote services to obtain valid user and administrator accounts.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Credential Stuffing
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used credential stuffing against victim's remote services to obtain valid accounts.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: PowerShell
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used PowerShell scripts to execute malicious payloads and the DSInternals PowerShell module to make use of Active Directory features.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Windows Command Shell
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used the Windows Command Shell and batch scripts for execution on compromised hosts.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Sharepoint
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has collected documents from the victim's SharePoint.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Data from Network Shared Drive
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has collected data of interest from network shares.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Local Data Staging
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has staged stolen data locally on compromised hosts.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Remote Data Staging
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has staged stolen data on designated servers in the target environment.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Domain Trust Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has nltest /domain_trusts to identify domain trust relationships.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Local Email Collection
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has harvested data from victim's e-mail including through execution of wmic /node: process call create "cmd /c copy c:\Users\\\backup.pst c:\windows\temp\backup.pst" copy "i:\\\My Documents\.pst" copy.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Remote Email Collection
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has harvested data from remote mailboxes including through execution of \\\c$\Users\\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Outlook*.ost.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Exfiltration Over C2 Channel
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154) C2 beacons for data exfiltration.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Exfiltration to Cloud Storage
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has exfiltrated stolen data to OneDrive accounts.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: External Remote Services
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used legitimate credentials to login to an external VPN, Citrix, SSH, and other remote services.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: File and Directory Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has utilized multiple commands to identify data of interest in file and directory listings.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Credentials
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has collected credentials for the target organization from previous breaches for use in brute force attacks.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: DLL
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used side loading to place malicious DLLs in memory.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Clear Windows Event Logs
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has cleared event logs on compromised hosts.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: File Deletion
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has performed file deletion to evade detection.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)

subtechniques.name: Timestomp
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used a Windows version of the Linux touch command to modify the date and time stamp on DLLs.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Ingress Tool Transfer
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has remotely copied tools and malware onto targeted systems.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)

technique_table_data.name: Lateral Tool Transfer
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has copied tools between compromised hosts using SMB.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Match Legitimate Resource Name or Location
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has renamed malware to GoogleUpdate.exe and WinRAR to jucheck.exe, RecordedTV.ms, teredo.tmp, update.exe, and msadcs1.exe.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)

subtechniques.name: Domain Controller Authentication
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114)'s malware has altered the NTLM authentication program on domain controllers to allow [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) to login without a valid credential.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)

technique_table_data.name: Multi-Factor Authentication Interception
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has registered alternate phone numbers for compromised users to intercept 2FA codes sent via SMS.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Native API
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used direct Windows system calls by leveraging Dumpert.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)

technique_table_data.name: Network Service Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used the get -b -e -p command for network scanning as well as a custom Python tool packed into a Windows executable named Get.exe to scan IP ranges for HTTP.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Network Share Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used net share and net view to identify network shares of interest.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Command Obfuscation
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has encoded PowerShell commands.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)

subtechniques.name: Tool
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has obtained and used tools such as [BloodHound](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0521), [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154), [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002), and [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029).(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: NTDS
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has gathered the SYSTEM registry and ntds.dit files from target systems.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020) [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) specifically has used the NtdsAudit tool to dump the password hashes of domain users via msadcs.exe "NTDS.dit" -s "SYSTEM" -p RecordedTV_pdmp.txt --users-csv RecordedTV_users.csv and used ntdsutil to copy the Active Directory database.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Password Policy Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used the NtdsAudit utility to collect information related to accounts and passwords.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Local Groups
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used net localgroup administrators to identify accounts with local administrative rights.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Process Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used tasklist to enumerate processes.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Protocol Tunneling
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has encapsulated [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154)'s C2 protocol in DNS and HTTPS.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Query Registry
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has queried Registry keys using reg query \\\HKU\\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Terminal Server Client\Servers and reg query \\\HKU\\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Internet Settings.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Remote Desktop Protocol
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used RDP to access targeted systems.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)

subtechniques.name: SMB/Windows Admin Shares
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used Windows admin shares to move laterally.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Windows Remote Management
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used WinRM for lateral movement.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Remote System Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has utilized various scans and queries to find domain controllers and remote services in the target environment.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Scheduled Task
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used scheduled tasks to invoke Cobalt Strike including through batch script schtasks /create /ru "SYSTEM" /tn "update" /tr "cmd /c c:\windows\temp\update.bat" /sc once /f /st and to maintain persistence.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: System Information Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used `fsutil fsinfo drives`, `systeminfo`, and `vssadmin list shadows` for system information including shadow volumes and drive information.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: System Network Configuration Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used [ipconfig](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0100), [Ping](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0097), and tracert to enumerate the IP address and network environment and settings of the local host.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: System Network Connections Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used netstat -ano | findstr EST to discover network connections.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: System Owner/User Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used the quser command to show currently logged on users.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: System Service Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used net start and net use for system service discovery.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Service Execution
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029) to deploy beacons on compromised systems.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: System Time Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used time /t and net time \\ip/hostname for system time discovery.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

subtechniques.name: Pass the Hash
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has dumped password hashes for use in pass the hash authentication attacks.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Valid Accounts
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used a valid account to maintain persistence via scheduled task.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)

subtechniques.name: Domain Accounts
subtechniques.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used compromised domain accounts to gain access to the target environment.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Windows Management Instrumentation
technique_table_data.descr: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used WMIC to execute remote commands.(Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

software_data.name: Cobalt Strike
software_data.descr: (Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

software_data.name: Mimikatz
software_data.descr: (Citation: Cycraft Chimera April 2020)(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)

Cycraft Chimera April 2020.description: Cycraft. (2020, April 15). APT Group Chimera - APT Operation Skeleton key Targets Taiwan Semiconductor Vendors. Retrieved August 24, 2020..

NCC Group Chimera January 2021.description: Jansen, W . (2021, January 12). Abusing cloud services to fly under the radar. Retrieved September 12, 2024.
